"Papa! Pa-pa!" he called after him, sobbing, "forgive me!" And seizing his father's hand, he pressed it to his lips and burst into tears. 
While father and son were having their ex- planation, the mother and daughter were hav- ing one not less important. Natdsha came run- ning to her mother, quite excited. , 
"Mamma! . . . Mamma! . . . He has made me . . ." 
"Made what?" 
"Made, made me an offer, Mamma! Mam- ma!" she exclaimed.
